```{r libraries, include = F}
library(caret)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(raster)
library(ggnewscale)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
time_range = "JJA"
date_start = "2023-06-01"
date_end = "2023-08-31"
```

```{r get_data, include = F}
TNSD <- read.csv(paste0("../data/Summary_T_", date_start, "_", date_end, ".csv")) |>
  dplyr::select(Log_name, Log_NR, STANDORT_NEU, Tropical_nights, Hot_days, total_valid_days, valid_days_percent, NORD_CHTOPO, OST_CHTOPO) |>
  drop_na()

data<-read_csv(paste0("../data/Logger_data_",date_start,"_",date_end,".csv"))
# shift the hours, so that the night is not cut in half
data <- data |>
  mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M", tz = "Europe/Zurich"))
```


# Maps for the city of Bern
```{r prepare_map, include = F}
LUmap <- raster("../data/Tiffs/Background_20_WGS84.tif")
LUmap <- as.data.frame(LUmap, xy=T)

# color scheme for LUmap:
# 1= Buildings
# 2= Sealed       
# 3= Garden       
# 4= Acriculture  
# 5= Forest    
# 6= Water   
value_colors <- c("grey72", "grey72", "lightgrey", "lightgrey", "grey68", "lightblue")

# color schemes for the datapoints
```

```{r map_VD, echo = TRUE}
valid_day_map <- TNSD |>
  # Remove Zollikofen 2m because we only want to map our 3m stations
    dplyr::filter(Log_name != "Zollikofen 2m")
  
  
colorscheme5 <- c("#CC9933", "#FFEE00", "#AAFF00", "#22BB22", "#004400")

VD_map<-
  ggplot()+
  geom_raster(data = LUmap, aes(x = x, y = y, fill = as.factor(Background_20_WGS84))) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = value_colors, na.value = "white", name=NULL, guide = F) +
  new_scale_fill() +
  geom_point(data=valid_day_map, 
             aes(x=OST_CHTOPO, y=NORD_CHTOPO, fill=valid_days_percent), 
             colour="black", size=8, pch=21) + 
  labs(title="Anteil Messtage mit > 80% Datenabdeckung (Juni-August)")+
  scale_fill_stepsn(limits=c(0,1), breaks=c(0.25,0.5,0.80,0.95,1), 
                    labels=c("< 25","25 - 50","50 - 80","80 - 95","95 - 100"),
                    colors = colorscheme5, name="Anteil in %", guide="legend")+
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(panel.grid =element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        legend.position=c(0.113,0.15),
        legend.background=element_rect(fill="white", color="black"),
        legend.key.size=(unit(0.8, "cm")),
        legend.text=element_text(size=14),
        plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5, margin=margin(b=-20,t=5) ,size=18))

VD_map
```

# Custom map for the Summer of 2023
Bedtime temperatures during the heatwave from 18th to 24th August.

```{r}
# Preprocess nighttime temperatures
bedtime <- data |>
  filter(month(Time) == 8, 
         day(Time) >= 18,
         day(Time) <= 24,
         hour(Time) == 22) |>
  summarise_all(~ mean(., na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  dplyr::select(-Time) |>
  dplyr::select(-Log_28, #`Parkli bei Eigerplatz`,
                -Log_141, #`Viererfeld 2 (Schacht)`,
                -Log_142, #`Viererfeld 3 (Strasse Sud)`,
                -Log_143, #`Viererfeld 4 (Strasse Nord)`,
                -Log_144, #`Viererfeld 5 (Mittelfeld)`,
                -Log_16, #`Bubenbergplatz`,
                -Log_124, #`Barenplatz`,
                -Log_34, #`Kasernenareal`,
                -Log_126, #`Optingenstrasse`,
                -Log_162, #`Ostermundigen Poststrasse`,
                -Log_161, #`Ostermundigen Schermenweg`,
                -Log_153, #`Ostermundigen Wegmuhlegassli`,
                -Log_14, # Helvetiaplatz,
                -Log_102, #`Vordere Langgasse`,
                -Log_98, #`Zollikofen 2m`,
                -Log_71, #Hirschengraben,
                -Log_45 #`Zytglogge`
                )
  
  
# Transpose the table to get the logger names as rows
bedtime <- as.data.frame(t(head(bedtime))) |> 
  rename(bedtime_T = V1) |> 
  rownames_to_column(var = "Log_name") |>
  mutate(bedtime_T = round(bedtime_T, digits = 1))

# Join to the TNSD table to get the coordinates
bedtime <- bedtime |> left_join(TNSD, by = "Log_name") |>
  drop_na()
```

```{r}
colorscheme5<-c("#C0A033", "orange", "#bd4026", "#551111", "#330000")

BT_map <-
  ggplot()+
  geom_raster(data = LUmap, aes(x = x, y = y, fill = as.factor(Background_20_WGS84))) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = value_colors, na.value = "white", guide = F) +
  new_scale_fill() +
  geom_text(data=bedtime, 
             aes(label = bedtime_T, x=OST_CHTOPO, y=NORD_CHTOPO, colour=bedtime_T), 
             size=5, fontface = "bold") +
  labs(title="Einschlaftemperaturen zwischen 22 und 23 Uhr (18. - 24. August)") +
  scale_colour_stepsn(limits=c(21,30), breaks=c(22:30), 
                    colors = colorscheme5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.grid =element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        # legend.position=c(0.1,0.185),
        # legend.background=element_rect(fill="white", color="black"),
        # legend.key.size=(unit(0.8, "cm")),
        # legend.text=element_text(size=14),
        plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5, margin=margin(b=-20,t=5) ,size=18))

BT_map
```

# Maps for the Commune of Ostermundigen
```{r}
LUmap_OM <- raster("../data/Tiffs/Background_OM_WGS84.tif") |>
  as.data.frame(xy=T) |>
  mutate(Background_OM_WGS84 = ifelse(Background_OM_WGS84 == 0, NA, Background_OM_WGS84))

TNSD_OM <- TNSD |>
  dplyr::select(starts_with("Ostermundigen"))

# color scheme for LUmap:
# 1= Buildings
# 2= Sealed       
# 3= Garden       
# 4= Acriculture  
# 5= Forest    
# 6= Water   
value_colors <- c("grey72", "grey72", "lightgrey", "lightgrey", "grey68", "lightblue")
```


```{r}
VD_map <-
  ggplot() +
  geom_raster(data = LUmap_OM, aes(x = x, y = y, fill = as.factor(Background_OM_WGS84))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = value_colors, na.value = "white", name = NULL, guide = FALSE) +
  new_scale_fill() +
  geom_point(data = filter(TNSD, OST_CHTOPO >= min(LUmap_OM$x) & OST_CHTOPO <= max(LUmap_OM$x) &
                             NORD_CHTOPO >= min(LUmap_OM$y) & NORD_CHTOPO <= max(LUmap_OM$y)),
             aes(x = OST_CHTOPO, y = NORD_CHTOPO, fill = valid_days_percent),
             colour = "black", size = 10, pch = 21) +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(min(LUmap_OM$x), max(LUmap_OM$x)), ylim = c(min(LUmap_OM$y), max(LUmap_OM$y))) +
  labs(title = "Anteil Messtage mit > 80% Datenabdeckung (Juni-August)") +
  scale_fill_stepsn(limits=c(0.79,1), breaks=c(0.80,0.90,0.95,0.99,1), 
                    labels=c("< 80","81 - 90","91 - 95","96 - 99","99 - 100"),
                    colors = colorscheme5, name = "Anteil in %", guide = "legend") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        legend.position = c(0.865, 0.22),
        legend.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = "black"),
        legend.key.size = (unit(0.7, "cm")),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 12),
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, margin = margin(b = -5, t = 5), size = 14))

VD_map

ggsave("OM_VD_map.jpg", VD_map, path = "../figures/2023", width = 6, height = 7)

```
